roleset.name: to make a sudden sweeping movement, as a bird descending upon its prey.
roleset.note: SWOOP-V NOTES: No Verbnet entry. (from swoop.01-v)

example.name: destination
example.text: The other trotted over and swooped at the tiny puddle.

example.name: with particle of direction
example.text: [His hands]-3 snatched at an imaginary bucket, [*-3]swooping down hard to grab it and coming away with equal snap like a ball that's been bounced hard.

roleset.name: to grab with a swooping motion
roleset.note: SWOOP_UP-V NOTES: No Verbnet entry. (from swoop.02-v)

example.name: swoop ya, there it is
example.text: Maude swooped up the cup and hiked up her top hoop as if about to take off with a racing start.
